summary: In short just adds the red's and blue's from RVB as followers to your skyrim
descriptionHtml:
Basically the same as the short description only i'm gonna say this is my first mod, let alone follower mod, so go easy please.
So far:
Blue team-
Church
Caboose
Tex
Tucker
Sister

Red team-
Sarge
Grif
Simmons
Donut
im pretty sure it has lopez but i can't remember

Freelancers(W.I.P)-
The Meta( He is pretty op so please be careful

I'm hoping to find some wiling modders and coders to help with a bloodgulch for them along with some armor, so if you're interested please p.m me.

UPDATE: Ok first off sorry for the massive absence with this mod, I was 13 at the time and had no clue what I was doing. To spawn them in you have to search them as I couldn't set a location for them properly, and sadly at this time do not have custom voices. But on the up note, I am back and working on this mod and will upload pics and have a better description and what not. Also I still don't know whether or not this mod is actually worth my time considering I can barely run the creation kit :/
author: yomama69698
